James Hupp

About

James is a person. He believes in being nice.

James is a content designer and strategist, currently managing the content design team at 18F. Previously, he worked at the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau.

James’s career began in digital campaigning: building email strategies for non-profits, managing tools and programs that enabled Obama for America’s grassroots supporters to raise money, and helping a progressive digital startup get off the ground.

Campaigning taught him to motivate an audience; government taught him that information needs to be sustainable. He’s been putting that understanding to use in public service ever since.

James is originally from Kansas City, Mo. Today, he lives Brooklyn. His nascent international travel habit is abetted by his better-traveled girlfriend; his home fermenting habit is abetted, sadly, by nobody. He could really use a climbing buddy.

Get in touch!
